virtual void handleMessage (cMessage *msg)
 Handles incoming START_APPLICATION or Scheduler messages.

Detailed Description

Base class for a TTEthernet-Application based on the TTEthernet-API.

The class contains the wrappers for the C to C++ Mapping.

Warning:
Please note that the TTEthernet-API functionality is not yet completely implemented
See also:
TTEAPITestApplication, TTEApplicationBase

Definition at line 71 of file TTEAPIApplicationBase.h.

Member Function Documentation

void TTEthernetModel::TTEAPIApplicationBase::handleMessage ( cMessage *  msg  )  [private, virtual]

Handles incoming START_APPLICATION or Scheduler messages.

The module receives START_APPLICATION messages that trigger startApplication() or messages via schedulerIn that contain Tasks to be executed.

Parameters:
msg the incoming message

00190 int32_t TTEAPIApplicationBase::tte_get_var(const uint8_t ctrl_id,
00191                                                             const tte_var_id_t var_id,
00192                                                             const uint32_t var_size,
00193                                                             void * const value){
00194     Enter_Method_Silent();
00195     switch(var_id){
00196         case TTE_VAR_LINK_STATUS:{
00197             cModule *phy = getParentModule()->getSubmodule("phy", 0);
00198             if(phy){
00199                 for(int i=0;i<phy->getVectorSize();i++){
00200                     EtherMACFullDuplex *mac = (EtherMACFullDuplex*)getParentModule()->getSubmodule("phy", i)->getSubmodule("mac");
00201                     if(mac->gate("phys")->isConnected())
00202                         *((uint8_t*)value) = *((uint8_t*)value)<<1 | 1;
00203                     else
00204                         *((uint8_t*)value) = *((uint8_t*)value)<<1;
00205                 }
00206             }
00207             else{
00208                 *((uint8_t*)value) = 0;
00209                 return ETT_NULLPTR;
00210             }
00211             break;
00212         }
00213         case TTE_VAR_CTRL_STATUS:{
00214             *((uint32_t*)value) = TTE_STAT_CONFIGURED | TTE_STAT_RUNNING;
00215             break;
00216         }
00217         case TTE_VAR_CTRL_COUNT:{
00218             *((uint8_t*)value) = 1;
00219             break;
00220         }
00221         case TTE_VAR_CHANNEL_COUNT:{
00222             cModule *phy = getParentModule()->getSubmodule("phy", 0);
00223             if(phy){
00224                 *((uint8_t*)value) = phy->getVectorSize();
00225             }
00226             else{
00227                 *((uint8_t*)value) = 0;
00228                 return ETT_NULLPTR;
00229             }
00230             break;
00231         }
00232         case TTE_VAR_TIME_RESOLUTION:{
00233             cModule *scheduler = getParentModule()->getSubmodule("tteScheduler", -1);
00234             if(scheduler){
00235                 *((tte_time_t*)value) = scheduler->par("tick").doubleValue();
00236             }
00237             else{
00238                 *((tte_time_t*)value) = 0;
00239                 return ETT_NULLPTR;
00240             }
00241             break;
00242         }
00243         case TTE_VAR_API_VERSION:{
00244             *((uint32_t*)value) = TTE_API_VER;
00245             break;
00246         }
00247         case TTE_VAR_THREAD_SAFE:{
00248             //TODO: CHECK WHETHER IT IS POSSIBLE TO SET TO TRUE (1)
00249             *((uint8_t*)value) = 0;
00250             break;
00251         }
00252         case TTE_VAR_MAC_ADDRESS:{
00253             uint8_t *valueArr= (uint8_t *)value;
00254             cModule *phy = getParentModule()->getSubmodule("phy", 0);
00255             if(phy){
00256                 EtherMACFullDuplex *mac = (EtherMACFullDuplex*)phy->getSubmodule("mac");
00257                 MACAddress macAddress = mac->getMACAddress();
00258                 //Change order
00259                 valueArr[5] = macAddress.getAddressByte(0);
00260                 valueArr[4] = macAddress.getAddressByte(1);
00261                 valueArr[3] = macAddress.getAddressByte(2);
00262                 valueArr[2] = macAddress.getAddressByte(3);
00263                 valueArr[1] = macAddress.getAddressByte(4);

00278 int32_t TTEAPIApplicationBase::tte_open_output_buf(tte_buffer_t * const buf,
00279                                                    tte_frame_t * const frame){
00280     Enter_Method_Silent();
00281     TTEAPIPriv *priv = (TTEAPIPriv*)buf->priv;
00282 
00283     //Now we create a frame that can be accessed later
00284     //TODO Divide TT and RC frames in separate types?
00285     if(buf->traffic_type==TTE_BG_TRAFFIC){
00286         priv->frame = new EtherFrame("BG-Traffic Ethernet Frame", IEEE802CTRL_DATA);
00287     }
00288     else{
00289         std::stringstream frameNameStream;
00290         frameNameStream << "CT-ID: " << buf->ct_id;
00291         std::string frameName = frameNameStream.str();
00292         priv->frame = new CTFrame(frameName.c_str(), IEEE802CTRL_DATA);
00293     }
00294     priv->frame->setByteLength(ETHER_MAC_FRAME_BYTES);
00295 
00296     MACAddress dest;
00297     dest.setAddressByte(5, frame->eth_hdr.dst_mac[0]);
00298     dest.setAddressByte(4, frame->eth_hdr.dst_mac[1]);
00299     dest.setAddressByte(3, frame->eth_hdr.dst_mac[2]);
00300     dest.setAddressByte(2, frame->eth_hdr.dst_mac[3]);
00301     dest.setAddressByte(1, frame->eth_hdr.dst_mac[4]);
00302     dest.setAddressByte(0, frame->eth_hdr.dst_mac[5]);
00303     priv->frame->setDest(dest);
00304     MACAddress src;
00305     src.setAddressByte(5, frame->eth_hdr.src_mac[0]);
00306     src.setAddressByte(4, frame->eth_hdr.src_mac[1]);
00307     src.setAddressByte(3, frame->eth_hdr.src_mac[2]);
00308     src.setAddressByte(2, frame->eth_hdr.src_mac[3]);
00309     src.setAddressByte(1, frame->eth_hdr.src_mac[4]);
00310     src.setAddressByte(0, frame->eth_hdr.src_mac[5]);

00409 int32_t TTEAPIApplicationBase::tte_set_buf_var(tte_buffer_t * const buf,
00410                                    const tte_buf_var_id_t var_id,
00411                                    const uint32_t var_size,
00412                                    const void * const value){
00413     Enter_Method_Silent();
00414     TTEAPIPriv *priv = (TTEAPIPriv*)buf->priv;
00415     switch(var_id){
00416         case TTE_BUFVAR_RECEIVE_CB:{
00417             APICallback *cb = dynamic_cast<APICallback*>(priv->buffer->getReceiveCallback(this));
00418             if(cb == NULL){
00419                 cb = new APICallback(priv->buffer);
00420                 priv->buffer->addReceiveCallback(cb, this);
00421             }
00422             cb->setFunctionPointer((void(*)(void *))value);
00423             break;
00424         }
00425         case TTE_BUFVAR_TRANSMIT_CB:{
00426             APICallback *cb = dynamic_cast<APICallback*>(priv->buffer->getTransmitCallback(this));
00427             if(cb == NULL){
00428                 cb = new APICallback(priv->buffer);
00429                 priv->buffer->addTransmitCallback(cb, this);
00430             }
00431             cb->setFunctionPointer((void(*)(void *))value);
00432             break;
00433         }
00434         case TTE_BUFVAR_CB_ARG:{
00435             APICallback *cb = dynamic_cast<APICallback*>(priv->buffer->getReceiveCallback(this));
00436             if(cb == NULL){
00437                 cb = dynamic_cast<APICallback*>(priv->buffer->getTransmitCallback(this));
00438                 if(cb == NULL){
00439                     return ETT_NULLPTR;
